positive_examples: This is an example of ambush attack.
The ambush attack demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed ambush attack in this context.
A typical case of ambush attack would involve these features.
The concept of ambush attack applies here.
A surprise military assault launched from a concealed position against an unsuspecting enemy.
negative_examples: This is an example of direct assault, not ambush attack.
This represents military assault in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: DirectAssault, or other types of MilitaryAssault

definition: A surprise attack from a concealed position on an unsuspecting target.
